    • Constructor Detail

      • CharacterSelection

        public CharacterSelection()
        Constructor for the character selection. Sets all of the options, and the screen that allows the user to pick the characters.

    • Method Detail

      • startSelection

        public void startSelection()
        Method that starts the animator that allows the user to select characters. Begins a new thread.

      • setUpCharacterSelectionScreen

        public void setUpCharacterSelectionScreen()
        Method that sets up the screen that allows the user to select characters.

      • setUpStartButton

        public void setUpStartButton()
        Method that sets up the start button. Start button initializes the game.

      • setUpDefaultAvatars

        public void setUpDefaultAvatars()
        Method that sets up an array list that corresponds to the avatars being used and their positions. Uses a for loop to iterate through the possible avatars, and then adds them to the character avatar list.

      • setUpAllCharacterPositions

        public void setUpAllCharacterPositions()
        Sets up a hash map for the given character positions.

      • setUpWeaponButtons

        public void setUpWeaponButtons()
        Sets up the weapon buttons for weapon selection. There are buttons that correspond to each possible weapon, the user can select which weapon for each character. The characters are also displayed on the screen to help the user assign weapons properly.

      • setUpButtons

        public void setUpButtons()
        Sets the positions for all of the buttons.

      • drawCharacterCard

        public void drawCharacterCard​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                              int x,
                              int y,
                              int[] characterImgPosition)
        Draws the panel that has the characters on it. Accepts g2, x and y values, and the int array that corresponds to each character's position.
        Parameters:
        g2 -
        x -
        y -
        characterImgPosition -

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)

      • drawCharacterSelectionPanel

        public void drawCharacterSelectionPanel​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Sets up the panel for the character selection screen. This panel allows the user to select the characters and weapons.
        Parameters:
        g2 -

      • run

        public void run()
        Main selection loop. This will constantly repaint the screen according to the FPS Code from the tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VpH33Uw-_0E
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
